verbs.description: [ARG0: Distant relative] [V: says] [ARG1: she was contacted by the actor in early April to say he convinced President Trump to pardon the first black heavyweight champion] .
Distant relative says she [V: was] contacted by the actor in early April to say he convinced President Trump to pardon the first black heavyweight champion .
Distant relative says [ARG1: she] was [V: contacted] [ARG0: by the actor] [ARGM-TMP: in early April] [ARG2: to say he convinced President Trump to pardon the first black heavyweight champion] .
Distant relative says [ARG0: she] was contacted by the actor in early April to [V: say] [ARG1: he convinced President Trump to pardon the first black heavyweight champion] .
Distant relative says she was contacted by the actor in early April to say [ARG0: he] [V: convinced] [ARG1: President Trump] [ARG2: to pardon the first black heavyweight champion] .
Distant relative says she was contacted by the actor in early April to say he convinced [ARG0: President Trump] to [V: pardon] [ARG1: the first black heavyweight champion] .
